trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref> for an endpoint through configuration.

The WebScriptEnablingElement is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> subtype that can be used to include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> on an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: WebScriptEnablingElement 是<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement>可用于包括的子类型<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>通过配置终结点上。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement>

trans-unit.source: There are no configurable properties on this element.
trans-unit.target: 此元素中没有可配置属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, in turn, allows an endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web pages when it is configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>，反过来，可使终结点配置， <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>由 ASP.NET AJAX 网页访问</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to enable a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]如何启用[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服务以响应 ASP.NET AJAX 客户端，请参阅[为 ASP.NET AJAX 创建 WCF 服务](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement"></xref> class.
Gets the type of the behavior enabled by this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此配置元素启用的行为的类型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> for the behavior enabled with the configuration element: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior"></xref>.
